Insight: the clarity of understanding of one's thoughts, feelings and behavior
Mindfulness: Mindfulness is the psychological process of bringing one's attention to experiences occurring in the present moment, which can be developed through the practice of meditation and other training.

Insight: Grant, A. M., Franklin, J., & Langford, P. (2002). The self-reflection and insight scale: A new measure of private self-consciousness. Social Behavior and Personality: an international journal, 30(8), 821-835.
Mindfulness: gpt-4o-2024-05-13 which references: American Psychological Association. (2023). Mindfulness. In APA Dictionary of Psychology. Retrieved from https://dictionary.apa.org/mindfulness
